title: Lobbyist list
context: [ยง97-4.5] Lobbyist list. As soon as is feasible after the commencement of each regular session of the legislature, the state ethics commission shall publish a list of registered lobbyists, the names of the persons whom they represent, and other pertinent information but shall not include in such list the addresses of the lobbyists. The list shall be supplemented from time to time as may be necessary. [L 1980, c 129, ยง1(f)]
